title: Invite and provision business member Snapshot

requestBody.title: Create resources representing hosts/assets/venues API Trace
Owner creates business tenant API Trace

data.instruction: Using agents tools, create a biz representing The User Shares One Availability Contract with a Business (Internal + External). Use name/slug derived from saga context.
data.expectedResult: Biz is created, owner is auto-added as member with owner role, and biz id is captured.

data.title: Owner creates business tenant API Trace

data.instruction: Create at least one host resource and one non-host resource (asset or venue) suitable for the UC.
data.expectedResult: Resources are created with expected type, location, and buffers.

requestBody.title: Owner creates primary location API Trace

data.instruction: Using agents tools, create a biz representing The User Shares Different Source Sets with Different Businesses. Use name/slug derived from saga context.
data.expectedResult: Biz is created, owner is auto-added as member with owner role, and biz id is captured.

data.instruction: Create at least one host resource and one non-host resource (asset or venue) suitable for the UC.
data.expectedResult: Resources are created with expected type, location, and buffers.
